python_tr.python_script:
#!/bin/bash

# Define the Python script path
PYTHON_SCRIPT="/home/pavan/durga_check/example_code.py"
inp_ktc={inp_ktc}

# Check if the Python script exists
if [ ! -f "$PYTHON_SCRIPT" ]; then
    echo "Error: Python script not found at $PYTHON_SCRIPT"
    exit 1
fi

# Check if the inp_ktc variable is set
if [ -z "$inp_ktc" ]; then
    echo "Error: Variable inp_ktc is not set. Please set it before running the script."
    exit 1
fi

# Check if the inp_ktc file exists
if [ ! -f "$inp_ktc" ]; then
    echo "Error: Parquet file not found at $inp_ktc"
    exit 1
fi

# Print the paths for debugging
echo "Running Python script: $PYTHON_SCRIPT"
echo "With Parquet file: $inp_ktc"

# Run the Python script with the Parquet location as an argument
python3 "$PYTHON_SCRIPT" "$inp_ktc"

# Check the exit status of the Python script
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "Python script executed successfully."
else
    echo "Error: Python script failed to execute."
    exit 1
fi
